title: Romantic Heritage Stay Amid Venetoâ€™s Rolling Hills with Exquisite Dining
description: Discover the allure of UNESCO World Heritage-listed Vicenza, a romantic and artistic city ideally located between Venice and Milan. Leave the busy streets of the most renowned Italian cities behind and escape to Hotel Villa Michelangelo, a boutique hotel housed in an 18th-century villa surrounded by rolling hills. Add a stop in a hidden gem to your Italian journey and enjoy daily breakfast, a three-course dining experience, two bottles of Prosecco in your room and a welcome drink per person.
